SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="6c6fa6b1d6714803abf0644613b4c662" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's such a pleasure to speak with you![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I am [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal05"/]Fran√ßois[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] botany specialist and
enthusiast.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you a plant lover too?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6c6fa6b1d6714803abf0644613b4c662" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]For years I've been working on two-way
communication between plants and, well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
us.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think Pikmin might be the key!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="07070409556b40249778e3a9401047a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kindness.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's why I love plants and
Pikmin.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're kind![etc:Wait frame="8"/] They listen when you
talk and accept you, whoever you are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07070409556b40249778e3a9401047a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Who wouldn't want a friend like that?
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]There'd be so much less sadness in this
world if everyone could befriend a Pikmin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07070409556b40249778e3a9401047a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]For the good of civilization,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we MUST
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]propagate more Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Help me with
this task for a token of my thanks.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="f889fdf7823c4e779a4bdb70ee0774b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Throughout my career,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've come across a
few cases of two nearly identical plants...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But one of them was usually toxic.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f889fdf7823c4e779a4bdb70ee0774b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Perhaps we have the same situation here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You and I look very alike,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but if one of us is
poisonous,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's likely to be me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh heh...
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="715c4a75603f4ebcb5ecdd67fc9b353e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Your tail is as fluffy as a ball of
cotton![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I were to blow on it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] would it
simply float away?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh heh...
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="4ce9cf9e689c43e798da9f1e89a27ae4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Can you communicate with Pikmin?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4ce9cf9e689c43e798da9f1e89a27ae4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I'd be quite interested to find out...
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_Leaf_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="75c5f8419bf0452699d48bdaa5b330dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When I see your tail,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are you
an envoy from the botanical realm?
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_Leaf_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="3c2ed51867e24fe8a0c7d713ef055982" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Just look at that adorable tail,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could I,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
perhaps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] examine it?
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="66582615f8934218bb0611f81543b14a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Your horticultural efforts have not gone
unnoticed![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Pikmin population has
bloomed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks to you.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="15840637149a472f982db8fd5bef2d56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There you are.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The aforementioned token.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That is my thanks for all your hard work.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="45b0e9ad235f47a09ff6798cc30811ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The faster the Pikmin population grows,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the sooner the universe will overflow with
happiness![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45b0e9ad235f47a09ff6798cc30811ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Not to put too fine a point on it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but that
means the happiness of the universe
depends on you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] No pressure, of course.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="8157a361983f4fe4b402d427a4ddcf9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When harvesting Pellet Posies,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I suggest
you avoid the majestic roots and aim for
the hard and unnatural pellet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8157a361983f4fe4b402d427a4ddcf9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]That unwieldy, round pellet is much easier
to detach if you think of it as an attack.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="1d0b76f8bc3249479a2bb0619957df24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]As a member of the research task force
led by [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf04"/]Chet[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I came here to investigate
this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d0b76f8bc3249479a2bb0619957df24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The group is an organization formed for
the sole purpose of environmental
research and the like.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d0b76f8bc3249479a2bb0619957df24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I am one of a broad collection of
specialists pursuing many different
fields of study.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="11dfb70b56c443eeb0f953c02677e92e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My research is intent on figuring out what
plants are actually thinking by the types
and concentration of their hormones.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11dfb70b56c443eeb0f953c02677e92e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]For example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when Pikmin exhibit a
particular reaction,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they secrete a certain
amount of a specific hormone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11dfb70b56c443eeb0f953c02677e92e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If we can decode that process,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] perhaps
we can use it to inhabit and explore the
minds of plants as well![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11dfb70b56c443eeb0f953c02677e92e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]And maybe never leave...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh heh!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="099268b809fb45a9b74ce1c32128ab62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I did it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I saw it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] On the Rescue Corps's
relay,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there was a recording of the
ineffable Glow Pikmin![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="099268b809fb45a9b74ce1c32128ab62" Scale="1"/]They were like tiny jewels of light pouring
down...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Basking in their ephemeral glow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I felt within me the twinkle of life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="099268b809fb45a9b74ce1c32128ab62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's curious how they fell right to where
you were...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Glow Pikmin are such
mysterious entities,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ha!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="30860511269448e88ded3778e2c3f75f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]After a certain amount of time passes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
a Glow Pikmin will,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can you believe it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
bloom a flower![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30860511269448e88ded3778e2c3f75f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Did you personally witness the moment
their blossoms opened up?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It must have
been a sight beyond words,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] yes?
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="b8b91f6f6e1b42efadba5d739eb4b6fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]How go your Pikmin-propagation efforts?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
If you task them with carrying a pellet of
their type,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they will multiply,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b8b91f6f6e1b42efadba5d739eb4b6fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]The type of the new sprouts is in fact
determined by majority rule![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The wisdom
of nature continues to baffle me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] heh!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="dbfd06588d0e439aa3a716f2c9314ef9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Pellet Posies suck up nectar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
crystallized forms of which are the
pellets they proudly display.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dbfd06588d0e439aa3a716f2c9314ef9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]And Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as you know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] really love their
nectar![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ha,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the scamps!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="1cbf911c5e47434fab83597fbc493cd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Large numbers of Pikmin won't emerge
all at once.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could this be to judge the
capabilities of the one seeking them out?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1cbf911c5e47434fab83597fbc493cd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]If that's the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then you might be the
one being put to task by the Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] heh!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="6beb11fa02ec4f6f854c8614e5001b6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd love to work beside Pikmin as you
do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the thought of throwing them‚Äî
perhaps to their doom‚Äîis a bit...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6beb11fa02ec4f6f854c8614e5001b6f" Scale="1"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know they don't dislike it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But even
so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just don't think I could look them in
their little eyes again...
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="ceb8c198d2e64978938b36aa4ae58951" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If the Pikmin species did,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] evolve
from plants...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ceb8c198d2e64978938b36aa4ae58951" Scale="1"/]They may have developed a means of
communication in order to have someone
propagate their numbers for them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ceb8c198d2e64978938b36aa4ae58951" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The promise of their kind flourishing is
dependent upon the help of another.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's species interdependence!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="c2eaf2c92ff0491d8b8fdc9b63ee7c88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've researched nonstop for years with the
hopes of one day communicating directly
with plants.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c2eaf2c92ff0491d8b8fdc9b63ee7c88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]When I learned of the Pikmin's existence,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
my heart pounded with anticipation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was
a sign that my dreams were not in vain!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="ef6d876fe5294b9d813f4d489741dc19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Do plants have consciousness or not?
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]That very question is the foundation
of my research,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] heh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef6d876fe5294b9d813f4d489741dc19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I've only uncovered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to a certain degree,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the means of information transmission at
the cellular and individual levels,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef6d876fe5294b9d813f4d489741dc19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It could even be possible that plants
possess consciousness and a sense of
self from the seed stage!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="6b16be8cd90244d8baa9e02a50944735" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Thanks to you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Pikmin are propagating
steadily.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The day when plants and our
kind fully understand each other...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]is nigh.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="479389c426d74a1b9e0376a727780f53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When harvesting Pellet Posies,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I suggest
you avoid the majestic roots and aim for
the hard and unnatural pellet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="479389c426d74a1b9e0376a727780f53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]That unwieldy, round pellet is much easier
to detach if you think of it as an attack.
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="5c77cc53b24d43ecb0188158c14b9722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My research is intent on figuring out what
plants are actually thinking by the types
and concentration of their hormones.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5c77cc53b24d43ecb0188158c14b9722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]For example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when Pikmin exhibit a
particular reaction,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they secrete a certain
amount of a specific hormone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5c77cc53b24d43ecb0188158c14b9722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If we can decode that process,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] perhaps
we can use it to inhabit and explore the
minds of plants as well![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5c77cc53b24d43ecb0188158c14b9722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]And maybe never leave...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh heh!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="499c3600a64e406b8b0713792247ec1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]After a certain amount of time passes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]

their blossoms opened up?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It must have
been a sight beyond words,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] yes?

If you task them with carrying a pellet of

It's species interdependence!
SV004.SV004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_11:
